alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Lee; Phillips; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 3:05AM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas and West Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
